song.title: Holy Forest
song.info:
3.Holy Forest (5:40)
Crossing down the secret paths that led to the old valley, Riding through the sacred woods, the ancient sanctuary where lay, dead, our old gods...
On our way we found the trace of the evil invasion Strange animals ran around us - nature's perversion And their tormented eyes...
Balance was broken between darkness and light Life was corrupted by an evil might The earth was screaming, full of deep pain And we heeded her call across the mountains...
Holy forest, crying our names Mighty and brave, we have heard your call For the salvation of our beloved lands The dark reign of evil will now fall!
The sacred flame of life won't fade smothered by Algoth's claw As ancient prophecies said, four warriors will crush the foe And I know we are the Ones!
Balance was broken between darkness and light Life was corrupted by an evil might The earth was screaming, full of deep pain And we heeded her call across the mountains...
Holy forest, crying our names Mighty and brave, we have heard your call For the salvation of our beloved lands The dark reign of evil will now fall!
